title: Mobile Technology-Enhanced Music-Based Language Learning Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage skills and experience in music appreciation
context.additional_context: Participants utilize personal tablets or smartphones in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) format, engaging in microlearning activities that combine music creation and language learning. The program targets learners with no prior experience in music theory or language education.

learning_goals: Learners can express designated Korean lyric patterns through rhythm and melody using mobile apps
Learners can generate sentences using more than 10 basic Korean vocabulary words in a project-based music production process
Learners can compare the intonation and rhythm of Korean pronunciation based on music materials collected through inquiry-based learning

resources: GarageBand or FL Studio Mobile Apps

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
